data:
Exclusion Criteria:
- CMV-seronegative recipient (R-)
- Match related or unrelated allogeneic stem cell transplant with post-transplant cyclophosphamide

Inclusion Criteria:
-CMV-seropositive recipient (R+) AND
- High risk of CMV infection meeting ONE of the following criteria:
- Umbilical cord blood transplant recipient
- Haploidentical recipient
- Recipient of ex-vivo T-cell depleted grafts
- Recipient of mismatched related or mismatched unrelated allogeneic stem cell transplant
- Recipient treated with with antithymocyte globulin (ATG) for conditioning
- Recipient requiring high dose steroids (defined as 1 mg/kg/day or greater of prednisone, or wquivalent dose of another corticosteroid) for acute graft versus host disease (GVHD)
- Recipient with documented history of CMV disease prior to transplantation
- AND patient has undetectable CMV DNA at baseline (less than 35 IU/mL)
-AND must be prescribed by a Leukemia/BMT or Transplant Infectious Disease provider
Select if patient is on cycloSPORINE. Start on Day +10 or up to Day + 28 and continue until Day + 100
240 mg, PO, qdaily, Justification: No formulary alternative for indication, drug form:tab
240 mg, IV, qdaily,  Justification: No formulary alternative for indication, drug form:inj
Select if patient is on TACrolimus. Start on Day +10 or up to Day + 28 and continue until Day + 100
480 mg, PO, qdaily,  Justification: No formulary alternative for indication, drug form:tab
4800 mg, IV, qdaily,  Justification: No formulary alternative for indication, drug form:inj
